title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local LLMs with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; interact with Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI (rich markdown) for chatting with Ollama models, written in Python.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama; chat, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed, async, streaming support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that proxies to Ollama; deploy with Docker in one command.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust-api
summary: Lightweight Rust wrapper around Ollama REST endpoints; supports streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and delete models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready docker-compose with Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama; GenServer-based with streaming.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama; minimal HTTP wrapper with allocator-aware JSON.
